order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (u_id, u_name, u_pwd, u_dapartmentid, u_roleid, u_sex, u_phone, u_address, u_age, u_telphone, u_idcard, u_mail, u_qq, u_hobby, u_edu, u_salarycard, u_nation, u_marry, u_remark, u_updatetime, u_pic ) values (#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uDapartmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uRoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uHobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uEdu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uSalarycard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uMarry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
